Class XMLUtil

public class XMLUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class keeps static utility method to make it easier to create and handle XML objects. Creation date: (2001-04-17 21:04:10)

Version:

simpleTag

public static java.lang.String simpleTag(java.lang.String tagName,
                                         java.util.Properties attributes)
                                  throws org.w3c.dom.DOMException

Generates a simple XML tag use the supplies Properties object to generated the tag attributes, and returns a String representation.

Sample usage:
 Properties p = new Properties();
 p.setProperty("attribute", "value");
 System.out.println(XMLUtil.simpleTag("dummy-tag", p));
Output: <dummy-tag attribute="value"/>

org.w3c.dom.DOMException
